Package src.recomanador.domini

Class ConjuntItems

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
java.util.AbstractList<E>
java.util.ArrayList<Item>
src.recomanador.domini.ConjuntItems
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Item>, Collection<Item>, List<Item>, RandomAccess
public class ConjuntItems extends ArrayList<Item>
This class represents a set of items in the form of an ArrayList extension. It keeps the items sorted according to the item's ID, to achieve better performance when modifying this list.
See Also:

    • nom

      private static String nom
      Nom conjunt d'items

    • maxAtributs

      private ArrayList<Float> maxAtributs
      Maximum attributes for each column. Columns with strings, names and booleans will have random data

    • minAtributs

      private ArrayList<Float> minAtributs
      Minimum attributes for each column. Columns with strings, names and booleans will have random data

  • Constructor Details

    • ConjuntItems

      public ConjuntItems() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemStaticValuesNotInitializedException
      Empty constructor. It only can be performed if the different Item static atributes are initialized.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemStaticValuesNotInitializedException - If the static values are not initialised

    • ConjuntItems

      public ConjuntItems(ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> items) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemTypeNotValidException, src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemWeightNotCorrectException, src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemStaticValuesAlreadyInitializedException, src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemIdNotValidException, src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemStaticValuesNotInitializedException, src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemNewAtributesNotValidException, src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException
      Constructor with an array of items. This array is subdivided for atributes with ;
      For each item it is assigned an array of strings.
      Furthermore:
      -Automatically detects the attributes types
      -Calculates the maximums and minimums of the attributes
      -Defaults all the weights to its maximum value (100)
      -Fills the array with the names of each attribute
      -Sets the position of id to the attribute with name id
      -Sorts all items
      Parameters:
      items - Array of an array of atributes. The first must be a header with the name of each attribute
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemTypeNotValidException - Is thrown when the header does not contain "id" or when it is not valid
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemWeightNotCorrectException - Is thrown if it tries to assign a weight out of the range (0-100)
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemStaticValuesAlreadyInitializedException - Static values of items are already initialized
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemIdNotValidException - There's no atribute valid tu use as ID
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemStaticValuesNotInitializedException - Thrown if the values are not correctlly initialized at the begining of the constructor
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemNewAtributesNotValidException - There's some new atribute not valid
      src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException - Problem with the definition of atribute types

    • ConjuntItems

      public ConjuntItems(ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> items, ArrayList<Float> pesos, ArrayList<Item.tipus> tipusAtribut, int id, int nomA, String nom, ArrayList<Float> maxAtributs, ArrayList<Float> minAtributs) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemWeightNotCorrectException, src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemStaticValuesAlreadyInitializedException, src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemIdNotValidException, src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemStaticValuesNotInitializedException, src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemNewAtributesNotValidException, src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException
      Constructor with an array of items, weights, attribute types, maximum attributes, minimum attributes, a string for the name, the position of the id attribute and the position of the name attribute.
      Parameters:
      items - Array of an array of atributes. The first must be a header with the name of each attribute
      pesos - Array of weights for each attribute
      tipusAtribut - Array of types of each attributes
      id - Position of the attribute "id" in the array of name of attributes
      nomA - Position of the attribute of the name of each item in the array of name of attributes
      nom - Name that represents the set
      maxAtributs - Array of the maximum attributes of each column
      minAtributs - Array of the minimum attributes of each column
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemWeightNotCorrectException - Is thrown if it tries to assign a weight out of the range (0-100)
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemStaticValuesAlreadyInitializedException - Static values of items are already initialized
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemIdNotValidException - There's no atribute valid tu use as ID
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemStaticValuesNotInitializedException - Thrown if the values are not correctlly initialized at the begining of the constructor
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemNewAtributesNotValidException - There's some new atribute not valid
      src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException - Problem with the definition of atribute types

      Returns:
      Return an array of an array of an array of strings which is the representation for an array of attributes of items

      private void setMinAtributs(ArrayList<Float> minAtributs2)
      Sets the minimum attributes to the parameter array
      Parameters:
      minAtributs2 - Must be an array with the minimum values in the set and with size equals to the number of attributes

    • tipusCorrecteColumna

      private boolean tipusCorrecteColumna(int columna, Item.tipus t)
      Checks if the column "columna" could be treated as a type t
      Parameters:
      columna - int column
      t - type which will be checked
      Returns:
      boolean, if true it can be treated as type t, if false the column cannot be treated as type t

      public boolean existeixItem(int id)
      Returns if an item with attribute id exists
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the item that is searched
      Returns:
      true if the item is in the set, false if the item does not exist

    • computeMinMaxAtribut

    • detectarTipusAtributs

      public void detectarTipusAtributs() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemTypeNotValidException, src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemIdNotValidException, src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemStaticValuesAlreadyInitializedException
      Detects the type of each column and assigns it to the type array
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemTypeNotValidException - if it doesn't exist an id column.
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemStaticValuesAlreadyInitializedException - The static values are already initialized.
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemIdNotValidException - There's not a valid column to use ad the ID of the items.

    • distanciaItem

      public float distanciaItem(Item i1, Item i2) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemTypeNotValidException
      Computes and returns the similarity between two items comparing their attributes individually
      Parameters:
      i1 - first item to be compared
      i2 - second item to be compared
      Returns:
      float between 0 and 1 where 0 means completely different and 1 means exaclty the same
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemTypeNotValidException - if the two items cannot be compared

    • binarySearchItem

      public static int binarySearchItem(ArrayList<Item> list, int id, int lo, int hi)
      Basic binary search adapted to work with Items
      Parameters:
      list - ArrayList of Items
      id - target to search for
      lo - lower bound
      hi - upper bound
      Returns:
      returns -1 if the target is not in the list, otherwise, the position of the target in the list
